trans-unit.source: This data can be extracted through a variety of methods. One of the most well known methods of positioning is GPS (Global Positioning System), a publicly available system that uses radiowave signals received from Earth-orbiting satellites to calculate the precise position and time of the receiver. Another popular method is 'Cell Identifier Positioning', which uses the cell identifier of the cell site that is currently serving the receiving device to calculate its approximate location. These and other positioning methods can all be used with the Location API; the only requirement for a location data source within the API is that it provides a latitude-longitude coordinate with a date/time value, with the option of providing the other attributes listed above.
trans-unit.target: 这种数据可以通过各种方法提取。最著名的定位方法之一是GPS(全球定位系统),这是一个公开的系统,使用从地球轨道卫星接收的无线电波信号来计算接收器的精确位置和时间。另一种流行的方法是 "小区标识符定位",它使用当前为接收设备提供服务的小区站点的小区标识符来计算其大致位置。这些方法和其他定位方法都可以与Location API一起使用;API中对位置数据源的唯一要求是,它必须提供一个带有日期/时间值的经纬度坐标,并可以选择提供上述其他属性。

This data can include the device name, GATT services offered by the device, and so on. The data set via this class will be used when advertising is started by calling QLowEnergyController::startAdvertising(). Objects of this class can represent an Advertising Data packet or a Scan Response packet.
trans-unit.target: 此数据可以包括设备名称，设备提供的GATT服务等。通过调用QLowEnergyController :: startAdvertising（）启动广告时，将使用通过此类设置的数据。此类的对象可以表示广告数据包或扫描响应包。

trans-unit.source: This datagram's destination address is not copied if it is an IPv4 address because it is not possible to tell an IPv4 broadcast address apart from a regular IPv4 address without an exhaustive search of all addresses assigned to this machine. Attempting to send a datagram with the sender address equal to the broadcast address is likely to fail. However, this should not affect the communication as network interfaces with multiple IPv4 addresses are uncommon, so the address the operating system will select will likely be one the peer will understand.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个数据报的目的地址是IPv4地址,则不会被复制,因为如果不对分配给这台机器的所有地址进行详尽的搜索,就无法区分IPv4广播地址和普通IPv4地址。试图发送发送者地址等于广播地址的数据报,很可能会失败。不过,这应该不会影响通信,因为具有多个IPv4地址的网络接口并不常见,所以操作系统选择的地址很可能是对等机能够理解的地址。

trans-unit.source: This differs from providing qt_SubRect_<name> uniforms in that the latter allows drawing one or more textures from the atlas in a single ShaderEffect item, while supportsAtlasTextures allows multiple instances of a ShaderEffect component using a different source image from the atlas to be batched in a single draw. Both prevent a texture from being copied out of the atlas when referenced by a ShaderEffect.
trans-unit.target: 这与提供qt_SubRect_ <name>制服不同，后者可以在单个ShaderEffect项中从图集绘制一个或多个纹理，而supportsAtlasTextures允许使用与图集不同的源图像将ShaderEffect组件的多个实例批处理到一个单次抽奖。当被ShaderEffect引用时，这两者都可以防止纹理从图集中复制出来。

trans-unit.source: This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.

This document demonstrates two different ways of integrating normal C++ code (that uses Qt) with managed .NET code. First, the manual way is presented, which includes using a thin MC++ wrapper class around the normal Qt/C++ class. Then, the automated way is presented, which utilizes the ActiveQt framework as a generic bridge. The advantage of the first method is that it gives the application developer full control, while the second method requires less coding and relieves the developer of dealing with the conversion between managed and normal data objects.
trans-unit.target: 本文档演示了将普通C ++代码（使用Qt）与托管.NET代码集成的两种不同方式。首先，介绍了手动方式，其中包括在常规Qt / C ++类周围使用瘦MC ++包装器类。然后，提出了一种自动化方法，该方法利用ActiveQt框架作为通用桥梁。第一种方法的优点是它使应用程序开发人员具有完全控制权，而第二种方法需要较少的编码，并减轻了开发人员处理托管数据对象与普通数据对象之间的转换的负担。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the basic drag and drop mechanism and outlines the approach used to enable it in custom controls. Drag and drop operations are also supported by many of Qt's controls, such as the item views and graphics view framework, as well as editing controls for Qt Widgets and Qt Quick. More information about item views and graphics view is available in Using drag and drop with item views and Graphics View Framework.
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了基本的拖放机制，并概述了在自定义控件中启用它的方法。 Qt的许多控件（例如项目视图和图形视图框架）以及Qt Widgets和Qt Quick的编辑控件也支持拖放操作。有关在项目视图和图形视图框架中使用拖放的信息，请参见有关项目视图和图形视图的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This document explains how the default scene graph renderer works internally, so that one can write code that uses it in an optimal fashion, both performance and feature-wise.

trans-unit.target: 本文档解释了OpenGL的场景图渲染器的内部工作原理,以便人们可以编写以最佳方式使用它的代码,无论是从性能上还是从功能上。

trans-unit.source: This does create the underlying OpenGL texture object. Therefore, construction using this constructor does require a valid current OpenGL context.

trans-unit.source: This does not create the underlying OpenGL texture object. Therefore, construction using this constructor does not require a valid current OpenGL context.

trans-unit.source: This does not delete the interceptor, but merely removes it from the engine. You can re-use it on the same or a different engine afterwards.

This does not include this item's own bounding rect; it only returns its descendants' accumulated bounding rect. If you need to include this item's bounding rect, you can add boundingRect() to childrenBoundingRect() using QRectF::operator|().
trans-unit.target: 这不包括该项目自己的边界矩形；它仅返回其后代的累积边界rect。如果需要包括此项的边界矩形，则可以使用QRectF :: operator |（）将boundingRect（）添加到childrenBoundingRect（）。

trans-unit.source: This effect adds a vertical gradient to the whole scene, then additively blends it with all other elements on the layer. Additive blending adds the pixel values of the gradient and the layer, making the result lighter. White areas do not change, and black areas are the same color as the gradient.
This effect adjusts the source item colors separately for each color channel. Source item contrast can be adjusted and color balance altered.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可分别调整源项目的每个颜色通道的颜色。可以调整源项目的对比度并改变色彩平衡。

trans-unit.source: This effect adjusts the source item colors. Brightness adjustment changes the perceived luminance of the source item. Contrast adjustment increases or decreases the color and brightness variations.
trans-unit.target: 该效果可调整源项目的颜色。亮度调整会改变源项目的感知亮度。对比度调整增加或减少颜色和亮度的变化。

trans-unit.source: This effect is intended to have good performance. The shape of the glow is limited to a rectangle with a custom corner radius. For situations where custom shapes are required, consider Glow effect.
trans-unit.target: 该效果旨在具有良好的性能。发光的形状仅限于具有自定义拐角半径的矩形。对于需要自定义形状的情况，请考虑发光效果。

trans-unit.source: This effect provides a simple one-pass blur. It is less expensive than GaussianBlur, but does not give the same quality result.
This effectively means that the control types (like Button) from the last imported style will be used. We refer to this as compile time style selection.
This effectively means the model has no elements or attributes of type IDREF.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有 IDREF 类型的元素或属性。

trans-unit.source: This effectively means the model has no elements that have an id.
trans-unit.target: 这实际上意味着该模型没有具有id的元素。

trans-unit.source: This element allows to define a list of polylines at once. Each polyline in the list will be preceded by a moveTo command, effectively making each polyline a separate one. The polylines in this list are supposed to be non-intersecting with each other. In any case, when used in conjunction with a ShapePath, the containing ShapePath's ShapePath::fillRule applies. That is, with the default OddEvenFill and non intersecting shapes, the largest shape in the list defines an area to be filled; areas where two shapes overlap are holes; areas where three shapes overlap are filled areas inside holes, etc.
This element allows you to set timed transitions on particle groups.
trans-unit.target: 该元素允许你对粒子组设置定时转换。

trans-unit.source: This element cannot be directly created.

trans-unit.source: This element defines the shape of a specified string in a specified font. The text's baseline will be translated to the x and y coordinates, and the outlines from the font will be added to the path accordingly.
This element emits logical particles into the ParticleSystem, with the given starting attributes.
trans-unit.target: 该元素使用给定的起始属性将逻辑粒子发射到ParticleSystem中。

trans-unit.source: This element emits logical particles into the ParticleSystem, with the starting positions based on those of other logical particles.
trans-unit.target: 该元素将逻辑粒子发射到ParticleSystem中，其起始位置基于其他逻辑粒子的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: This element models the gravity of a massive object whose center of gravity is far away (and thus the gravitational pull is effectively constant across the scene). To model the gravity of an object near or inside the scene, use PointAttractor.
trans-unit.target: 这个元素可以模拟一个巨大物体的重力,这个物体的重心在很远的地方(因此整个场景的引力实际上是恒定的)。要模拟场景附近或场景内部物体的重力,请使用PointAttractor。

trans-unit.source: This element will accelerate all affected particles to a vector of the specified magnitude in the specified angle. If the angle and acceleration do not vary, it is more efficient to set the specified acceleration on the Emitter.
trans-unit.target: 这个元素将把所有受影响的粒子加速到指定角度的指定大小的矢量。如果角度和加速度没有变化,在发射器上设置指定的加速度会更有效。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the QDesignerTaskMenuExtension class is included in the Qt Designer module, which means, for example, that the class will appear on the list created by calling the \generatelist command with the {classesbymodule QtDesigner} argument.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保Qt Designer模块中包含QDesignerTaskMenuExtension类，这意味着，例如，该类将出现在通过使用 {classesbymodule QtDesigner} 参数调用\ generatelist命令创建的列表中。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the appropriate files are copied to the right place and the correct icons are used as required by the Apple App Store. Ad-hoc distributions should also include the following filenames in the application bundle to visualize the application in iTunes:
trans-unit.target: 这样可以确保按照苹果应用商店的要求,将适当的文件复制到正确的位置,并使用正确的图标。特制发行版还应在应用捆绑包中包含以下文件名,以便在iTunes中可视化应用。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the resources are linked into the final application binary in the case of static linking. You should put the initialization code close to where the resources are used in your library, so that clients of your library will only link in the resources if they use the feature of the library that depends on them.
trans-unit.target: 这确保了在静态链接的情况下,资源被链接到最终的应用程序二进制中。你应该把初始化代码放在靠近你的库中使用资源的地方,这样你的库的客户端只有在使用依赖资源的库的功能时,才会把资源链接进去。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that whenever QDoc generates references to entities in the Qt Core module, the base URL is https://doc.qt.io/qt/.

trans-unit.target: 这个枚举可以用来指定事件的优先级。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes QGraphicsItem's cache modes. For some paint devices, the cache is stored directly in graphics memory, which makes rendering very quick.

This enum describes how each pixel is interpreted. If a pixel is read as a full 32 bit unsigned integer and then each channel is masked out, or if each byte is read as unsigned char values. Typically QImage formats interpret one pixel as an unsigned integer and then the color channels are masked out. OpenGL on the other hand typically interpreted pixels "one byte after the other", Ie. unsigned byte.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举描述了每个像素的解释方式。如果将像素读取为完整的32位无符号整数，然后将每个通道屏蔽掉，或者如果将每个字节读取为无符号char值。通常，QImage格式将一个像素解释为无符号整数，然后将颜色通道屏蔽掉。另一方面，OpenGL通常将像素解释为“一个字节接一个字节”，即。无符号字节。

trans-unit.source: This enum describes if the alpha channel is used or not. Sometimes the pixelformat will have a size for the alpha channel, but the pixel format does actually not use the alpha channel. For example RGB32 is such a format. The RGB channels are 8 bits each, and there is no alpha channel. But the complete size for each pixel is 32. Therefore the alpha channel size is 8, but the alpha channel is ignored. Its important to note that in such situations the position of the alpha channel is significant.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举描述的是alpha通道是否被使用。有时像素格式会有一个alpha通道的大小,但实际上像素格式并没有使用alpha通道。例如RGB32就是这样一种格式。RGB通道每个8位,没有alpha通道。但是每个像素的完整尺寸是32。因此alpha通道的大小是8,但是alpha通道被忽略了。需要注意的是,在这种情况下,alpha通道的位置很重要。

trans-unit.source: This enum indicates whether a given host address is eligible to be published in the Domain Name System (DNS) or other similar name resolution mechanisms. In general, an address is suitable for publication if it is an address this machine will be reached at for an indeterminate amount of time, though it need not be permanent. For example, addresses obtained via DHCP are often eligible, but cryptographically-generated temporary IPv6 addresses are not.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示一个给定的主机地址是否有资格在域名系统(DNS)或其他类似的名称解析机制中公布。一般来说,如果一个地址是这个机器在不确定的时间内可以到达的地址,那么这个地址就适合发布,尽管它不需要是永久性的。例如,通过DHCP获得的地址通常符合条件,但通过密码生成的临时IPv6地址则不符合条件。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth low energy service characteristics class UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. The detailed type descriptions can be found on bluetooth.org.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举是蓝牙低功耗服务特征类UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。可以在bluetooth.org上找到详细的类型描述。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth protocol UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是Bluetooth协议UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for Bluetooth service class and profile UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. Some UUIDs refer to service class ids, others to profile ids and some can be used as both. In general, profile UUIDs shall only be used in a QBluetoothServiceInfo::BluetoothProfileDescriptorList attribute and service class UUIDs shall only be used in a QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceClassIds attribute. If the UUID is marked as profile and service class UUID it can be used as a value for either of the above service attributes. Such a dual use has historical reasons but is no longer permissible for newer UUIDs.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是Bluetooth服务类和配置文件UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。一些UUID引用服务类ID，另一些UUID引用配置文件ID，另一些可以同时使用。通常，配置文件UUID仅应在QBluetoothServiceInfo :: BluetoothProfileDescriptorList属性中使用，服务类UUID应仅在QBluetoothServiceInfo :: ServiceClassIds属性中使用。如果将UUID标记为配置文件和服务类UUID，则可以将其用作上述服务属性之一的值。这种双重用途具有历史原因，但对于新的UUID不再允许。

trans-unit.source: This enum is a convienience type for descriptor class UUIDs. Values of this type will be implicitly converted into a QBluetoothUuid when necessary. The detailed type specifications can be found on bluetooth.org.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举是描述符类UUID的便捷类型。必要时，此类型的值将隐式转换为QBluetoothUuid。可以在bluetooth.org上找到详细的类型规范。

trans-unit.target: 这个枚举由fileTime（）和setFileTime（）函数使用。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by the constructor and setKey(). Its purpose is to enable handling the problem in Unix implementations of semaphores that survive a crash. In Unix, when a semaphore survives a crash, we need a way to force it to reset its resource count, when the system reuses the semaphore. In Windows, where semaphores can't survive a crash, this enum has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 构造函数和setKey（）使用此枚举。其目的是使在崩溃中幸存的信号量的Unix实现中能够解决该问题。在Unix中，当信号在崩溃中幸存下来时，我们需要一种方法来在系统重用信号时强制其重置其资源计数。在Windows中，信号量无法在崩溃中幸免，该枚举无效。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used by the permission() function to report the permissions and ownership of a file. The values may be OR-ed together to test multiple permissions and ownership values.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举被 permission()函数用来报告文件的权限和所有权。这些值可以一起被OR-ed来测试多个权限和所有权值。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in QGraphicsItem, QGraphicsScene and QGraphicsView to specify how items are selected, or how to determine if shapes and items collide.
trans-unit.target: 在QGraphicsItem，QGraphicsScene和QGraphicsView中使用此枚举来指定如何选择项目，或如何确定形状和项目是否碰撞。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in QGraphicsScene to specify what to do with currently selected items when setting a selection area.
trans-unit.target: 在QGraphicsScene中使用此枚举指定在设置选择区域时如何处理当前选择的项目。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in conjuntion with the QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::deviceUpdated() signal and indicates the field that changed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent :: deviceUpdated（）信号结合使用，并指示已更改的字段。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in the option argument to toDiagnosticNotation(), to modify the output format.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于toDiagnosticNotation（）的option参数中，以修改输出格式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in the options argument to toCbor(), modifying the behavior of the encoder.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于toCbor（）的options参数中，以修改编码器的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used in widgets that can display both plain text and rich text, for example QLabel. It is used for deciding whether a text string should be interpreted as one or the other. This is normally done by passing one of the enum values to a QTextEdit::setTextFormat() function.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于可同时显示纯文本和富文本的小部件，例如QLabel。它用于确定是否应将一个文本字符串解释为一个字符串。通常通过将枚举值之一传递给QTextEdit :: setTextFormat（）函数来完成。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used internally by QStyleOption, its subclasses, and qstyleoption_cast() to determine the type of style option. In general you do not need to worry about this unless you want to create your own QStyleOption subclass and your own styles.
trans-unit.target: QStyleOption，其子类和qstyleoption_cast（）在内部使用此枚举来确定样式选项的类型。通常，除非您要创建自己的QStyleOption子类和自己的样式，否则无需担心。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to communicate properties between the print engine and QPrinter. A property may or may not be supported by a given print engine.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于在打印引擎和QPrinter之间传递属性。给定的打印引擎可能支持或可能不支持属性。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to control whether or not transient parents should be considered ancestors.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来控制是否应该将瞬移的父母视为祖先。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe how a page should be rendered.
This enum is used to describe parts of a window frame. It is returned by QGraphicsWidget::windowFrameSectionAt() to describe what section of the window frame is under the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于描述窗口框架的各个部分。它由QGraphicsWidget :: windowFrameSectionAt（）返回，以描述窗口框的哪个部分位于鼠标下方。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the features or capabilities that the paint engine has. If a feature is not supported by the engine, QPainter will do a best effort to emulate that feature through other means and pass on an alpha blended QImage to the engine with the emulated results. Some features cannot be emulated: AlphaBlend and PorterDuff.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于描述绘画引擎具有的功能。如果引擎不支持某个功能，则QPainter将尽最大努力通过其他方式来仿真该功能，并将具有alpha混合效果的QImage传递给引擎并提供仿真结果。某些功能无法仿真：AlphaBlend和PorterDuff。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the permission status.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述权限状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the position of a toolbar line, as well as the toolbar's position within the line.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述工具栏线的位置,以及工具栏在该线中的位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe the view mode of the preview widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于描述预览小组件的视图模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe whether a toolbar is movable or not.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来描述一个工具栏是否可以移动。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to describe zoom mode of the preview widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举用于描述预览小组件的缩放模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleHintReturn subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项类型的信息，并为每个QStyleHintReturn子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the type of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项类型的信息，并为每个QStyleOption子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleHintReturn subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项版本的信息，并为每个QStyleHintReturn子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to hold information about the version of the style option, and is defined for each QStyleOption subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于保存有关样式选项版本的信息，并为每个QStyleOption子类定义。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate what the user may select in the file dialog; i.e. what the dialog will return if the user clicks OK.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用于指示用户在文件对话框中可以选择的内容;即如果用户点击确定,对话框将返回什么。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate whether or not a check mark should be drawn for the item, or even if it should be drawn at all.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指示是否应该为该项目画上复选标记,甚至是否应该画上复选标记。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to indicate whether printing will occur on one or both sides of each sheet of paper (simplex or duplex printing).
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指示在每张纸的一面或两面进行打印(单面或双面打印)。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to represent the placement of the item on a row. This can be used to draw items differently depending on their placement, for example by putting rounded edges at the beginning and end, and straight edges in between.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来表示项目在行上的位置。这可以用来根据项目的位置来绘制不同的项目,例如,在开始和结束处放置圆角边,而在中间放置直角边。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify a single-valued type.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定一个单值类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify extensions to be installed via installExtensions().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指定要通过installExtensions（）安装的扩展。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the OpenGL context profile, in conjunction with QSurfaceFormat::setMajorVersion() and QSurfaceFormat::setMinorVersion().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于与QSurfaceFormat :: setMajorVersion（）和QSurfaceFormat :: setMinorVersion（）一起指定OpenGL上下文配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the OpenGL context profile, in conjunction with QSurfaceFormat::setMajorVersion() and QSurfaceFormat::setMinorVersion().

This enum is used to specify the preferred color space, controlling if the window's associated default framebuffer is able to do updates and blending in a given encoding instead of the standard linear operations.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定首选的颜色空间,控制窗口相关的默认帧缓冲区是否能够在给定的编码中进行更新和混合,而不是标准的线性操作。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify the type of a bind parameter.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举用来指定绑定参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used to specify whether a Node will accept a url with an unrecognized schema for the hostUrl. By default only urls with known schemas are accepted, but using AllowExternalRegistration will enable the Registry to pass your external (to QtRO) url to client Nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举用于指定Node是否接受hostUrl具有无法识别的架构的url。默认情况下，仅接受具有已知架构的URL，但是使用 AllowExternalRegistration 将使注册表能够将您的外部（传递给QtRO）URL传递给客户端节点。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used when opening a file to specify additional options which only apply to files and not to a generic QIODevice.
trans-unit.target: 打开文件时使用此枚举来指定仅适用于文件而不适用于常规QIODevice的其他选项。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QAndroidBinder::transact() to describe the mode in which the IPC call is performed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QAndroidBinder :: transact（）一起使用，以描述执行IPC调用的模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with open() to describe the mode in which a device is opened. It is also returned by openMode().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与open（）一起使用，以描述打开设备的模式。它也由openMode（）返回。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QtAndroid::bindService to describe the mode in which the binding is performed.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QtAndroid :: bindService一起使用，以描述执行绑定的模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with QTouchDevice::capabilities() to indicate what kind of information the touch device or its driver can provide.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与QTouchDevice :: capabilities（）一起使用，以指示触摸设备或其驱动程序可以提供什么样的信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum is used with the toRawForm() function to declare which form of a cookie shall be returned.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举与toRawForm（）函数一起使用，以声明应返回哪种形式的cookie。

trans-unit.source: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the other sections.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举可以让你知道该部分的位置与其他部分的关系。

trans-unit.source: This enum lets you know where the section's position is in relation to the selected section.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举可以让你知道节的位置与所选节的关系。

trans-unit.source: This enum lists all the things that can be benchmarked.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举列出了所有可以被基准化的东西。

trans-unit.source: This enum lists the possible network request priorities.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举列出了可能的网络请求优先级。

trans-unit.source: This enum maps the Unicode character categories.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举映射了Unicode字符类别。

trans-unit.source: This enum numbers the different tests.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举对不同的测试进行编号。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides additional information concerning a QMouseEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举提供了有关QMouseEvent的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides platform-specific information about the sizes of data structures used by the underlying architecture.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了有关底层架构使用的数据结构大小的平台特定信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides pre-defined world IDs for isolating user scripts into different worlds:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了预先定义的世界ID,用于将用户脚本隔离到不同的世界中。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides shorter names for the keyboard modifier keys supported by Qt.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举为Qt支持的键盘修饰键提供了较短的名称。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides symbolic names for the various operating system families supported by QOperatingSystemVersion.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举为QOperatingSystemVersion支持的各种操作系统家族提供符号名称。

trans-unit.source: This enum provides symbolic synonyms for the data serialization format version numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举提供了数据序列化格式版本号的符号同义词。

trans-unit.source: This enum represent standard key bindings. They can be used to assign platform dependent keyboard shortcuts to a QAction.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举代表标准键绑定。它们可用于将依赖于平台的键盘快捷键分配给QAction。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a control element. A control element is a part of a widget that performs some action or displays information to the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举代表一个控制元素。控制元素是widget的一部分,它可以执行一些操作或向用户显示信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents a sub-area of a widget. Style implementations use these areas to draw the different parts of a widget.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举代表一个小组件的子区域。样式实现使用这些区域来绘制小组件的不同部分。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the QCborValue type. It is returned by the type() function.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示QCborValue类型。它由type（）函数返回。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the acceleration mode of an acceleration sensor.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示加速度传感器的加速度模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the ambient light level.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示环境光照度。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the different ways a glyph can be rasterized in the function alphaMapForGlyph().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示在函数alphaMapForGlyph（）中栅格化字形的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the options that can be set on a socket. If desired, they can be set after having received the connected() signal from the socket or after having received a new socket from a QTcpServer.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示可以在套接字上设置的选项。如果需要的话，它们可以在接收到后设置连接从插座或从已经接收一个新的套接字（）后信号QTcpServer既可。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the orientation of the device.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示设备的方向。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the state of a touch point at the time a QTouchEvent occurred.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示QTouchEvent发生时触摸点的状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the supported TouchWindow touch flags for RegisterTouchWindow().
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示RegisterTouchWindow()支持的TouchWindow触摸标志。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the supported WM_WINDOW_TYPE atoms.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举表示支持的WM_WINDOW_TYPE原子。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents the type of device that generated a QPointerEvent.
This enum represents the type of device that generated a QTouchEvent.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举表示生成QTouchEvent的设备的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum represents what is interacting with the pointing device.
This enum returns the gesture type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举返回手势类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a category of QML property.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了QML属性的类别。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a component type.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了一个组件类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a role of the data requested.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了请求数据的作用。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a set of predefined presets for QGradient, based on the gradients from https://webgradients.com/.
This enum specifies a set of predefined presets for QGradient, based on the gradients from https://webgradients.com/.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举基于https://webgradients.com/中的渐变为QGradient指定了一组预定义的预设。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies a type of QML property.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了一个QML属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies different error cases
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的错误情况

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies flags that can be used to affect various aspects of the section() function's behavior with respect to separators and empty fields.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定标志，这些标志可用于影响section（）函数相对于分隔符和空字段的行为的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how QDomNode::save() determines what encoding to use when serializing.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QDomNode :: save（）如何确定序列化时使用的编码。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a state's child states are treated.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何处理一个状态的子状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a state's child states are treated:
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何处理一个状态的子状态。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how a text displaying widget reacts to user input.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了文本显示部件对用户输入的反应。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how camera view center is translated
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了摄像机视图中心的转换方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how completions are provided to the user.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何向用户提供完备性。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how gradient coordinates map to the paint device on which the gradient is used.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了如何将梯度坐标映射到使用梯度的绘图设备上。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how matching a file to a MIME type is performed.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了文件与MIME类型的匹配方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the split() function should behave with respect to empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定split（）函数应如何处理空字符串。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the setFont() function should behave with respect to unset font properties.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定setFont（）函数相对于未设置的字体属性的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the items in the model are sorted.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了模型中项目的排序方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the layout handles its child widgets regarding their visibility.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定布局如何处理其子部件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QAbstractScrollArea should adjust when the size of the viewport changes.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定当视口大小更改时，QAbstractScrollArea的大小提示应如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QComboBox should adjust when new content is added or content changes.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定添加新内容或更改内容时QComboBox的大小提示应如何调整。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how the size hint of the QComboBox should adjust when new content is added or content changes.
This enum specifies how the split() functions should behave with respect to empty strings.
This enum specifies how to align text in fields when the field is wider than the text that occupies it.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了当字段的宽度大于占用字段的文本时,如何对齐字段中的文本。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies how to resize the view.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定如何调整视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies string information that an accessible object returns.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了可访问对象返回的字符串信息。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of QWidget::activateWindow() and QWindow::requestActivate().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QWidget :: activateWindow（）和QWindow :: requestActivate（）的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of a modal panel. A modal panel is one that blocks input to other panels. Note that items that are children of a modal panel are not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定模态面板的行为。模态面板是一个能阻止输入到其他面板的面板。注意,模态面板的子项目不会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of a modal window. A modal window is one that blocks input to other windows. Note that windows that are children of a modal window are not blocked.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了模态窗口的行为。模态窗口是指能阻止输入到其他窗口的窗口。请注意,模态窗口的子窗口不会被阻止。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the behavior of the QPixmap::createMaskFromColor() and QImage::createMaskFromColor() functions.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QPixmap :: createMaskFromColor（）和QImage :: createMaskFromColor（）函数的行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the buttons in a wizard.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了向导中的按钮。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the content type to be shared.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定要共享的内容类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了坐标系。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the dictionary type of a word.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了一个词的字典类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different behaviours of readElementText().
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定readElementText（）的不同行为。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different looks supported by QWizard.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定QWizard支持的不同外观。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control how the group performs exclusive checking on checkable actions.
This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control the way in which the form's fields grow.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的策略,可以用来控制表格字段的生长方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different policies that can be used to control the way in which the form's rows wrap.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了不同的策略,这些策略可以用来控制表格行的缠绕方式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different types of servers that can be started with startServer.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定可以使用startServer启动的服务器的不同类型。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the different types of widgets in terms of layout interaction:
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了不同类型的小组件的布局交互。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the input mode for the input method.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定了输入法的输入模式。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the kind of transition. By default, the type is an external transition.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了过渡的类型。默认情况下,该类型是外部过渡。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the order of which results from the map or filter function are passed to the reduce function.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了map或filter函数的结果传递给reduce函数的顺序。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the physical position of the camera on the system hardware.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了摄像机在系统硬件上的物理位置。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the pixmaps that can be associated with a page.
trans-unit.target: 这个枚举指定了可以与页面关联的像素图。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the rendering backend for the surface.

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the restore policy type. The restore policy takes effect when the machine enters a state which sets one or more properties. If the restore policy is set to QState.RestoreProperties, the state machine will save the original value of the property before the new value is set.
trans-unit.target: 该枚举指定还原策略类型。当计算机进入设置一个或多个属性的状态时，还原策略将生效。如果还原策略设置为QState .RestoreProperties，则状态机将在设置新值之前保存该属性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies the restore policy type. The restore policy takes effect when the machine enters a state which sets one or more properties. If the restore policy is set to RestoreProperties, the state machine will save the original value of the property before the new value is set.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举指定了还原策略类型。当机器进入一个设置一个或多个属性的状态时,还原策略就会生效。如果还原策略被设置为RestoreProperties,状态机将在设置新的值之前保存属性的原始值。

trans-unit.source: This enum specifies why the focus changed. It will be passed through QWidget::setFocus and can be retrieved in the QFocusEvent sent to the widget upon focus change.

trans-unit.source: This enum the different performance hints that can be set on the QStaticText. These hints can be used to indicate that the QStaticText should use additional caches, if possible, to improve performance at the expense of memory. In particular, setting the performance hint AggressiveCaching on the QStaticText will improve performance when using the OpenGL graphics system or when drawing to a QOpenGLWidget.
trans-unit.target: 这枚举了可以在QStaticText上设置的不同性能提示。这些提示可用于指示QStaticText如果可能的话，应使用附加的缓存来提高性能，但以牺牲内存为代价。特别是，在使用OpenGL图形系统或绘制到QOpenGLWidget时，在QStaticText上设置性能提示AggressiveCaching 将提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This enum type (not to be confused with Orientation) is used to specify each page's orientation.

trans-unit.source: This enum type defines errors that can occur in the state machine at run time. trans-unit.source: This event handler, for GraphicsSceneMove events, is delivered after the widget has moved (e.g., its local position has changed).
trans-unit.target: 该事件处理程序（用于GraphicsSceneMove事件）在小部件移动（例如，其本地位置已更改）后交付。

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for GraphicsSceneResize events, is delivered after the widget has been resized (i.e., its local size has changed).
trans-unit.target: 在调整窗口小部件的大小（即更改其本地大小）之后，将为GraphicsSceneResize事件提供此事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for Hide events, is delivered after the widget has been hidden, for example, setVisible(false) has been called for the widget or one of its ancestors when the widget was previously shown.
trans-unit.target: 对于隐藏事件，此事件处理程序在小部件被隐藏后交付，例如，先前显示小部件时，已为小部件或其祖先之一调用setVisible（false）。

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for Show events, is delivered before the widget has been shown, for example, setVisible(true) has been called for the widget or one of its ancestors when the widget was previously hidden.
trans-unit.target: 对于Show事件，此事件处理程序是在显示窗口小部件之前传递的，例如，先前隐藏窗口小部件时，已为窗口小部件或其祖先之一调用setVisible（true）。

trans-unit.source: This event handler, for event
trans-unit.target: 这个事件处理程序,对于事件

trans-unit.source: This event is always preceded by a QDragEnterEvent and a series of QDragMoveEvents. It is not sent if a QDropEvent is sent instead.
trans-unit.target: 此事件始终在QDragEnterEvent和一系列QDragMoveEvent之前。如果发送QDropEvent而不发送它。

trans-unit.source: This event is delivered to the item by the scene at some point after it has been constructed, but before it is shown or otherwise accessed through the scene. You can use this event handler to do last-minute initializations of the widget which require the item to be fully constructed.
trans-unit.target: 该事件由场景在项目被构造后,但在它被显示或通过场景访问之前的某个时间点传递给它。您可以使用此事件处理程序来进行小组件的最后一分钟初始化,这需要项目完全构造。

trans-unit.source: This event is only delivered when the item is moved locally. Calling setTransform() or moving any of the item's ancestors does not affect the item's local position.
trans-unit.target: 仅当项目在本地移动时才传递此事件。调用setTransform（）或移动项目的任何祖先都不会影响项目的本地位置。

trans-unit.source: This event is only delivered when the widget is resized locally; calling setTransform() on the widget or any of its ancestors or view, does not affect the widget's local size.
trans-unit.target: 仅当在本地调整窗口小部件的大小时才传递此事件。在窗口小部件或其任何祖先或视图上调用setTransform（）不会影响窗口小部件的本地大小。

trans-unit.source: This event is only used to notify the application of a request. It may be safely ignored.
trans-unit.target: 该事件仅用于通知请求的申请。它可以被安全地忽略。

trans-unit.source: This event is sent just before QWidget::hide() returns, and also when a top-level window has been hidden (iconified) by the user.
trans-unit.target: 该事件在QWidget :: hide（）返回之前，以及在用户隐藏（显示）了顶层窗口时发送。

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to paint. To handle painting implement paintEvent() instead.

This example adds inline GeoJSON data to the map. Simply adding a source is not enough to get the data visible. It is also necessary to create a layer based on this source. After the layer is added, we also need to style its paint and layout properties. In this case we are changing the line color to blue, and the line width to 8 pixels, as well as also setting round line joints and caps.
trans-unit.target: 本示例将嵌入式GeoJSON数据添加到地图。仅仅添加一个源还不足以使数据可见。也有必要基于此源创建一个图层。添加图层后，我们还需要设置其绘画和布局属性的样式。在这种情况下，我们将线条颜色更改为蓝色，将线条宽度更改为8像素，还设置了圆形的线接点和盖帽。

trans-unit.source: This example also shows that changing an attribute received from an element changes the attribute of the element. If you do not want to change the value of the element's attribute you must use cloneNode() to get an independent copy of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还显示，更改从元素接收的属性会更改元素的属性。如果不想更改元素属性的值，则必须使用cloneNode（）获得属性的独立副本。

trans-unit.source: This example can be saved as "ClickableHelloWorld.qml" and run with qmlscene. Whenever the user clicks anywhere in the window, the rectangle will change from red to blue.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子可以保存为 "ClickableHelloWorld.qml",并用qmlscene运行。每当用户点击窗口中的任何地方,矩形就会从红色变为蓝色。

trans-unit.source: This example gets the list of font families, the list of styles for each family, and the point sizes that are available for each combination of family and style, displaying this information in a tree view.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子得到了字体族的列表,每个字体族的样式列表,以及每个字体族和样式组合的可用点大小,并在树状视图中显示这些信息。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates function calling with 0, 1 and 2 parameters and illustrates different parameter types passed in each (the first call to "ProcessWorkUnicode" will contain one Unicode string, the second call to "ProcessWork" will contain one string and one byte array).
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明了使用0、1和2参数进行的函数调用，并说明了在每个参数中传递的不同参数类型（对 "ProcessWorkUnicode" 的第一次调用将包含一个Unicode字符串，对 "ProcessWork" 的第二次调用将包含一个字符串和一个字节数组） 。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates that objects can work together without needing to know any information about each other. To enable this, the objects only need to be connected together, and this can be achieved with some simple QObject::connect() function calls, or with uic's automatic connections feature.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明了对象可以一起工作，而无需了解彼此的任何信息。为此，只需要将对象连接在一起即可，这可以通过一些简单的QObject :: connect（）函数调用或uic的自动连接功能来实现。
